index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Chapters 23.76 and 23.84 of the Seattle Municipal Code in response to requirements of Initiative 164, Chapter 98 of the Laws of 1995, and setting a contingent effective date.
committee: Housing, Community Development and Urban Environment
note: This ordinance did not take effect due to the defeat of Referendum 48.
